subject: Re: "The Seven"
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Yes, I have heard of this interpretation, too... ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  It's more than just some symbolic number junk. The Seven are real 
entities that attempt to work with human kind on the more subtle 
levels. A reverant approach in recommended, if one wants that kind of 
contact, and praying the Rosary is one way to access that level. 
Personally I prefer to avoid the religious dogma, but you can't 
completely throw it out either. 
>  
>  Frank-S
